brand_identity.name: Mavecode
brand_identity.archetype: The Performance Pro (Archetype 2) mixed with Vibrant Play (Archetype 6)
brand_identity.target_audience: Indonesian students and professionals seeking career upgrades

headings.usage: Landing page headlines, section titles, feature names. Use tight tracking (-0.02em).

code.usage: Code snippets, terminal views, technical stats.

typography.installation: Import via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;500;600&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400;500&family=Plus+Jakarta+Sans:wght@500;600;700;800&display=swap');

primary.name: Sky Blue
primary.usage: Primary CTAs, active states, brand highlights

accent.name: Mave Orange
accent.usage: Secondary CTAs, notifications, 'hot' features, logo accent

surface_dark.name: Slate 900
surface_dark.usage: Cards, sidebars, headers in Dark Mode

dashboard.sidebar: Fixed left sidebar (w-64), scrollable main content
dashboard.cards: Flat, 1px border, no shadow (or very subtle)

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-[0_0_20px_-5px_rgba(14,165,233,0.5)] rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-semibold transition-all hover:scale-105 active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white/10 text-white hover:bg-white/20 backdrop-blur-sm border border-white/10 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all
buttons.outline: border-2 border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary/10 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-semibold

cards.marketing: bg-slate-900/50 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/10 rounded-2xl hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-300 group
cards.dashboard: bg-card text-card-foreground border border-border rounded-xl shadow-sm

inputs.style: bg-background border-input ring-offset-background placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 rounded-lg h-11

mentor_card.style: relative overflow-hidden rounded-3xl aspect-[3/4] group cursor-pointer
mentor_card.interaction: Image scales up on hover. Info panel slides up from bottom. 'Mentor Reveal' effect.

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: backdrop-blur-xl bg-black/40 border border-white/10 (Use for sticky navs)
visual_enhancers.glow_effects: Use colored shadows (shadow-cyan-500/20) instead of black shadows for primary elements.
visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on dark backgrounds to prevent banding.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid borders with 10% opacity for structure.

required_animations: Hero Fade In: Staggered text reveal
Scroll Reveal: Sections slide up with opacity fade
Hover Lift: Cards lift -4px on hover
Mentor Reveal: Mask reveal animation for mentor photo

do_not: Use default Tailwind blue (blue-500) - use the custom brand Sky Blue.
must_do: Implement Dark Mode toggle but default to Dark for Landing Page.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Update tailwind.config.js with the new color palette and fonts. 2. Install 'framer-motion', 'lucide-react', 'clsx', 'tailwind-merge'. 3. Build the Landing Page first with the 'Tetris' grid. 4. Implement the Dashboard with the 'High Density' grid. 5. Use the provided asset URLs for images.
